item.title: Trump cuts fentanyl tariffs on China to 10% as Beijing delays latest rare earth curbs by a year
item.description: Trump said he will be going to China in April, followed by a trip by Xi to the U.S. without specifying a timeline.

item.title: European Central Bank holds rates steady as economy shows resilience
item.description: Top ECB board members told CNBC this month that the easing cycle is close to, or at its end.

item.title: From futuristic NEOM to tech and tourism, Saudi Arabia's priorities are shifting
item.description: Saudi's economy minister told CNBC the country was "reprioritizing a little bit towards sectors that need it the most."

item.title: ‘Partners and friends’: Xi strikes conciliatory tone as he meets Trump in South Korea
item.description: The high-stakes meeting comes as tensions between the world's two largest economies have escalated this year.

item.title: Trump’s rare earth deals target China’s dominance — here’s why change won’t come soon
item.description: Trump’s rare-earth push could channel crucial financing and eventually reduce Beijing’s dominance, but the effort will be costly and take years to bea...
